thread.title: Scarface honored, Diddy performs at taped BET Hip-Hop Awards

title: Scarface honored, Diddy performs at taped BET Hip-Hop Awards
text:
> Georgia Scarface honored, Diddy performs at taped BET Hip-Hop Awards Snoop Dogg poses for a photo at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards at the Atlanta Civic Center on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, in Atlanta.
